Utils
What are we doing?

Integrate music information from different data sources and web APIs and develop a mobile application to exploit this knowledge.
Models

Music ontology
http://mccarthy.dia.fi.upm.es/challenge/2011/music/musicontology.rdfs
http://musicontology.com/
Music Playlist
http://schemapedia.com/examples/9576ea0ea062f9695f746df463aa9338
Music preferences example
http://schemapedia.com/examples/95fbf52b271dd34d9fff951ab0c4dd55
Extended Music Artist Recommendation
http://schemapedia.com/examples/16c96bd43321048d4c838985f8a3e6aa
MobileTV Ontology
http://schemapedia.com/schemas/mobiletv
Data sources and APIs

Music APIs directory:
http://www.programmableweb.com/apis/directory/1?apicat=Music&sort=date

Several LOD datasets
Probably the most important LOD data source
